title: Average player age of participating national teams at the 2018 World Cup in Russia
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average player age in years for 32 number of Countrys.
The maximum Average player age in years 29.6 is found at Country Costa Rica and the minimum is found at Nigeria where Country is 25.9.
The difference of Average player age in years between the highest and lowest Country is 3.7.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Average player age in years in the y axis.
The Average player age in years is appeared to be the highest at Country Costa Rica and lowest at Country Nigeria.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average player age in years for 32 number of Countrys.
The maximum Average player age in years 29.6 is found at Country Costa Rica and the minimum is found at Nigeria where Country is 25.9.
The difference of Average player age in years between the highest and lowest Country is 3.7.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average player age in years for 32 number of Countrys.
The Average player age in years is appeared to be the highest at Country Costa Rica and lowest at Country Nigeria.
Country Nigeria has 1.14 times less Average player age in years than Country Costa Rica which is the highest.
The Country Costa Rica has the highest Average player age in years, followed by Mexico, and Argentina. Down to the Country Nigeria which is the lowest.
Country Sweden, Uruguay, Colombia, and Australia have the same Average player age in years.
The Country Nigeria tends to be 1.06 percent lower than average.
The Average player age in years is 891.6 if we add up values of all Countrys.
